pages.text: $(item)Bloodstone Bricks$() are a decorative block, and used as the $(thing)capstones$() for the Tier-4 $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(). They require $(item)Weak Blood Shards$(), which can be made by putting a $(l:bloodmagic:dungeons/tau_fruit)Saturated Tau$() into an $(l:bloodmagic:utility/alchemical_reaction_chamber)Alchemical Reaction Chamber$() with a $(l:bloodmagic:utility/alchemical_reaction_chamber#blood_shard)Sanguine Reverter$() in it.
